name: Mummy (6stringsamurai)
description:
You are a toddler. You're lost in the supermarket. The mission: Find mum!

 Movement: WASD

 Objective: Find your mother, avoid the guards. 

Failure: Time runs out, interacting with NPCs who aren't your parent will increase your panic level which will end the game if it gets too high.
